name: Avoid Subroutines with nested if Statements  (RPG300)
description:
This rule searches the subroutines having nested IF statements.
The rule checks for ENDIF statements and when it finds atleast 5 nested ENDIFs, it throws a violation.
output:
The rule checks for ENDIF statements and when it finds atleast 5 nested ENDIFs, it throws a violation.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Subroutines full name "
rationale: Nested IF statements made source code more difficult to read and to test.
remediation: Try to replace the nested IF statements  with an alternative source code.
